.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkDeviceGroupRenderPassBeginInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_DEVICE_GROUP_RENDER_PASS_BEGIN_INFO
* [[VUID-VkDeviceGroupRenderPassBeginInfo-pDeviceRenderAreas-parameter]] If pname:deviceRenderAreaCount is not `0`, pname:pDeviceRenderAreas must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:deviceRenderAreaCount sname:VkRect2D structures
